content: Still assigned to FHIR-I in the specification. Should be Vocabulary WG as agreed by both Work Groups. - unless something has changed? @Rob Hausam
It's an approved change request. It'll be applied at some point when we apply the 800+ other FHIR-I change requests...
If you feel passionate about it, feel free to submit the pull request yourself :)
I may be able to get to that in the near future.
